title: Apple and cranberry puff pastry mince pies
ingredients: ['4 eating apples, peeled and diced', '80g dried cranberries', '30g butter', '60g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon mixed spice', '1 or 2 drops vanilla extract', 'Zest of one orange', '1 (500g) packet ready rolled puff pastry', '1 egg, beaten for glazing', '1 or 2 tablespoons sugar for decorating']
